title: (x) Retro script - Spoleto aka OptiSport Script aka Aktuelle aka Athletic Script {Jan}
content:
I know this is an easy one. I have seen this script used a lot, but can never quite find it whenever I use the keyword "50s script" or "retro script", so I bow before the type demi-gods and pray they will look down with favor upon my tormented soul.

[http://3.bp.blogspot.com/\_p4PkoeXYyOQ/S3wTdAo4e\_I/AAAAAAAAGK0/G202RCJB3i...](http://web.archive.org/web/20141026231209/http:/3.bp.blogspot.com/_p4PkoeXYyOQ/S3wTdAo4e_I/AAAAAAAAGK0/G202RCJB3io/s1600-h/north3_preview.jpg "http://3.bp.blogspot.com/\_p4PkoeXYyOQ/S3wTdAo4e\_I/AAAAAAAAGK0/G202RCJB3io/s1600-h/north3\_preview.jpg")

The script used for "from" and "North Peak"
author: adnix

comments.content:
This came up several times before.  
It’s Spoleto, aka OptiSport Script, aka Aktuelle, aka Athletic Script.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141026231209im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Spoleto_5546.gif)
  
Image taken from Mike Yanega’s site  
 [http://www.bowfinprintworks.com/Script07Pg14.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20141026231209/http:/www.bowfinprintworks.com/Script07Pg14.html "http://www.bowfinprintworks.com/Script07Pg14.html")
